Ingredients.1: 1 medium butternut squash, chopped into 1/2-inch cubes

Ingredients.3: 2 medium sweet potatoes, chopped into 1/2-inch cubes

Ingredients.4: 2 medium parsnips, chopped into 1/2-inch cubes, or more to taste

Ingredients.5: 4 medium carrots, chopped into 1/2-inch cubes, or more to taste

Ingredients.7: 8  fresh mushrooms, quartered, or more to taste

Ingredients.9: 1 bulb garlic, cloves sliced lengthwise in half

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Place butternut squash, yams, sweet potatoes, parsnips, carrots, turnip, mushrooms, shallots, and garlic in a large bowl. Add rosemary, salt, and pepper. Toss until evenly mixed, then add oil and toss until coated. Pour into large baking pans so that the vegetables are no more than 1 1/2 inches deep.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven, tossing and scraping the bottom every 30 minutes, until vegetables are very tender, at least 90 minutes; longer is better.
